channel.title: Need help hosting my server :D
channel.description: Guys, I really need help in hosting my server. I have followed many tutorials out there and have spent countless days trying to achieve the online status! I am not asking for someone to just do it for me willingly but to show me how and if you would like, I would be willing to throw in some sort of reward if that is allowed :l. I would appreciate if anyone DID help me! I have a Qwest Modem Configuration Actiontec PK 5000 modem.

item.title: Need help hosting my server :D
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

okay get skype or try this then… I finally found a guide

http://portforward.com/english/routers/port_forwarding/Actiontec/PK5000/Runescape_Private_Server.htm

where it says LAN Ip Address:

use the Ipv4 address from the Command Prompt

Read full topic
